title: Are there any required redistributables for a Unity game?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I would like to know if Unity games require additional redistributables (for example Visual Studio Runtime, DirectX, or .NET)?

sections.title: Cause
content: Sometimes PC games require additional files to be included with the installation. When shipping with Steam there is a list of redistributables it can automatically install for a game.

sections.title: Resolution
content: If you use DirectX, it makes sense to let Steam install it, but you do not need the Visual Studio redistributables, or the .NET runtime.
